creator: EZ Education
descriptionHtml:
DoodleSpell builds the spelling confidence and ability of your 5-11 year old with a work programme tailored to their individual level, strengths and weaknesses. Using Proxima™, the same award-winning technology that powers DoodleMaths and DoodleEnglish, DoodleSpell analyses and intelligently designs a unique learning programme for each child.

▶ Key features

✓ A carefully personalised and highly motivating spelling programme
✓ Thoroughly researched by educational professionals
✓ DoodleSpell meets all UK English curriculum criteria for KS1 and KS2 spelling, from basic digraphs to complex homophones
✓ Great range of innovative question styles that support all types of learners
✓ Covers phonics sounds and vocabulary building
✓ Children are rewarded for their effort rather than ability; they feel a sense of accomplishment for their hard work
✓ Easily add your child’s weekly spelling list into the app
✓ Accessibility options such as coloured overlays and audio dictation for all questions
✓ Designed to be used for just ten minutes a day
✓ Work from anywhere with offline capabilities

Move beyond “Look, Cover, Write, Check” and help your child feel confident in their spelling by joining tens of thousands of families using Doodle!


▶ For children

• A personalised, engaging spelling work programme they’ll want to do every day
• A perfect homework partner for catching-up or getting ahead in spelling
• A fun spelling journey where children earn DoodleStars to buy potions for their wizard


▶ For parents

• A low-cost, high-impact alternative to English tuition
• Track and monitor progress through the free DoodleConnect app or online tracking hub
• Receive regular and insightful email updates on your child’s progress


▶ For teachers

• Track effort and impact across the whole school and individual classes
• Easily track progress and identify gaps in pupils’ knowledge
• Reduce your workload with instant feedback and analysis of pupils’ work, readily available to export


▶ Included in your subscription

All DoodleSpell app downloads also include access to the following:

• DoodleEnglish, our accompanying app which supports mastery of punctuation, grammar, spelling and comprehension
• DoodleConnect, our parent app where you can track progress, get instant updates and set motivational goals
•The Parent Dashboard, our online hub for discovering your child’s strengths and weaknesses

Enjoy full access to all of DoodleSpell’s features with DoodleSpell Premium! There are three types of subscription available per child:

One-month subscription - £5.99
Annual subscription - £55.99
Lifetime subscription - £169.99

We offer all users a free 7-day trial of DoodleSpell Premium to let you explore all of its exciting features.


▶ The boring stuff

Home users will need a paid subscription in order to get access to the Premium version of DoodleSpell.

The one-month subscription will be automatically renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period.

Your Google Play account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24hr period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your account settings.

When a subscription is cancelled, access to Premium features will expire at the end of the current payment period.

Lifetime subscriptions apply to the named child only. Lifetime subscriptions are not transferable between users.
descriptionShort: Rapidly accelerate your child's spelling with personalised daily practice.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Work never stops at Doodle. We have been working hard behind-the-scenes of DoodleSpell, providing you with a smoother experience as you move around the app.

We always want to know how DoodleSpell is working for you and how we can continue improving. If you have any feedback or new feature ideas, let us know in a review.

DoodleSpell builds the spelling confidence and ability of your 5-11 year old with a work programme tailored to their individual level, strengths and weaknesses. Using Proxima™, the same award-winning technology that powers DoodleMaths and DoodleEnglish, DoodleSpell analyses and intelligently designs a unique learning programme for each child.

▶ Key features

✓ A carefully personalised and highly motivating spelling programme
✓ Thoroughly researched by educational professionals
✓ DoodleSpell meets all UK English curriculum criteria for KS1 and KS2 spelling, from basic digraphs to complex homophones
✓ Great range of innovative question styles that support all types of learners
✓ Covers phonics sounds and vocabulary building
✓ Children are rewarded for their effort rather than ability; they feel a sense of accomplishment for their hard work
✓ Easily add your child’s weekly spelling list into the app
✓ Accessibility options such as coloured overlays and audio dictation for all questions
✓ Designed to be used for just ten minutes a day
✓ Work from anywhere with offline capabilities

Move beyond “Look, Cover, Write, Check” and help your child feel confident in their spelling by joining tens of thousands of families using Doodle!


▶ For children

• A personalised, engaging spelling work programme they’ll want to do every day
• A perfect homework partner for catching-up or getting ahead in spelling
• A fun spelling journey where children earn DoodleStars to buy potions for their wizard


▶ For parents

• A low-cost, high-impact alternative to English tuition
• Track and monitor progress through the free DoodleConnect app or online tracking hub
• Receive regular and insightful email updates on your child’s progress


▶ For teachers

• Track effort and impact across the whole school and individual classes
• Easily track progress and identify gaps in pupils’ knowledge
• Reduce your workload with instant feedback and analysis of pupils’ work, readily available to export


▶ Included in your subscription

All DoodleSpell app downloads also include access to the following:

• DoodleEnglish, our accompanying app which supports mastery of punctuation, grammar, spelling and comprehension
• DoodleConnect, our parent app where you can track progress, get instant updates and set motivational goals
•The Parent Dashboard, our online hub for discovering your child’s strengths and weaknesses

Enjoy full access to all of DoodleSpell’s features with DoodleSpell Premium! There are three types of subscription available per child:

One-month subscription - £5.99
Annual subscription - £55.99
Lifetime subscription - £169.99

We offer all users a free 7-day trial of DoodleSpell Premium to let you explore all of its exciting features.


▶ The boring stuff

Home users will need a paid subscription in order to get access to the Premium version of DoodleSpell.

The one-month subscription will be automatically renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period.

Your Google Play account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24hr period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your account settings.

When a subscription is cancelled, access to Premium features will expire at the end of the current payment period.

Lifetime subscriptions apply to the named child only. Lifetime subscriptions are not transferable between users.
descriptionShort: Boost your child's confidence and ability in Spelling.

DoodleSpell builds the spelling confidence and ability of your 5-11 year old with a work programme tailored to their individual level, strengths and weaknesses. Using Proxima™, the same award-winning technology that powers DoodleMaths and DoodleEnglish, DoodleSpell analyses and intelligently designs a unique learning programme for each child.

▶ Key features

✓ A carefully personalised and highly motivating spelling programme
✓ Thoroughly researched by educational professionals
✓ DoodleSpell meets all UK English curriculum criteria for KS1 and KS2 spelling, from basic digraphs to complex homophones
✓ Great range of innovative question styles that support all types of learners
✓ Covers phonics sounds and vocabulary building
✓ Children are rewarded for their effort rather than ability; they feel a sense of accomplishment for their hard work
✓ Easily add your child’s weekly spelling list into the app
✓ Accessibility options such as coloured overlays and audio dictation for all questions
✓ Designed to be used for just ten minutes a day
✓ Work from anywhere with offline capabilities

Move beyond “Look, Cover, Write, Check” and help your child feel confident in their spelling by joining tens of thousands of families using Doodle!


▶ For children

• A personalised, engaging spelling work programme they’ll want to do every day
• A perfect homework partner for catching-up or getting ahead in spelling
• A fun spelling journey where children earn DoodleStars to buy potions for their wizard


▶ For parents

• A low-cost, high-impact alternative to English tuition
• Track and monitor progress through the free DoodleConnect app or online tracking hub
• Receive regular and insightful email updates on your child’s progress

• Track effort and impact across the whole school and individual classes
• Easily track progress and identify gaps in pupils’ knowledge

title: DoodleSpell: Primary Spelling

creator: EZ Education
descriptionHtml:
Learn how to spell words with DoodleSpell, the app that brings spelling to life like never before!

Meeting all primary curriculum criteria for KS1 and KS2, DoodleSpell creates your child a unique learning experience tailored to their needs, boosting their confidence and ability in spelling.

▶ Key features

✓ Learn how to spell even the trickiest of words with fun, curriculum-aligned questions and spelling games

✓ DoodleSpell does much more than teach spellings — it also explores the meaning behind words and how to use them in sentences, building your child’s vocabulary

✓ You can add your own spelling lists to the app, making it a great way to prepare for spelling tests and spelling bees

✓ ‘Little and often’ works best — just 10 minutes of DoodleSpell a day will help your child to excel in KS1 and KS2 English

✓ DoodleSpell can be used offline on tablets, phones, laptops and desktops, so children can learn anywhere, anytime!

▶ For children

• A fun and engaging work programme they’ll want to use every day

• Fun spelling and word games designed to boost their vocabulary

• Unique collectables and virtual badges to unlock

• The perfect revision tool for any KS1 or KS2 learner wanting to catch up or get ahead in English

▶ For parents

• A low-cost, high-impact alternative to English tuition designed to help your child progress in KS1 and KS2 spelling

• No need to set or mark your child's work — DoodleSpell does the hard work for you!

• Easily track your child’s progress using the free DoodleConnect app or online Parent Dashboard

▶ For teachers

• A time-saving homework, consolidation and intervention solution, designed to support and enhance your teaching

• Use the online Teacher Dashboard to easily track progress and impact for individual learners, whole classes or across the entire primary school

• DoodleSpell is fully-aligned to the national curriculum and automatically sets work for each learner, removing the need for setting differentiated work!

▶ Pricing

Download the app for free, or enjoy access to all of DoodleSpell’s features by upgrading to DoodleSpell Premium!

title: DoodleSpell: Primary Spelling

creator: Discovery Education Europe Limited
descriptionHtml:
DoodleSpell builds the spelling confidence and ability of your 5-11 year old with a work program tailored to their individual level, strengths and weaknesses. Using Proxima™, the same award-winning technology that powers DoodleMath and DoodleEnglish, DoodleSpell analyses and intelligently designs a unique learning program for each child.

▶ Key features

✓ A carefully personalized and highly motivating spelling program
✓ Thoroughly researched by educational professionals
✓ Great range of innovative question styles that support all types of learners
✓ Covers phonics sounds and vocabulary building
✓ Children are rewarded for their effort rather than ability; they feel a sense of accomplishment for their hard work
✓ Easily add your child’s weekly spelling list into the app
✓ Accessibility options such as colored overlays and audio dictation for all questions
✓ Designed to be used for just ten minutes a day
✓ Work from anywhere with offline capabilities

Move beyond “Look, Cover, Write, Check” and help your child feel confident in their spelling by joining tens of thousands of families using Doodle!


▶ For children

• A personalized, engaging spelling work program they’ll want to do every day
• A perfect homework partner for catching-up or getting ahead in spelling
• A fun spelling journey where children earn DoodleStars to buy potions for their wizard


▶ For parents

• A low-cost, high-impact alternative to English tuition
• Track and monitor progress through the free DoodleConnect app or online tracking hub
• Receive regular and insightful email updates on your child’s progress


▶ For teachers

• Track effort and impact across the whole school and individual classes
• Easily track progress and identify gaps in pupils’ knowledge
• Reduce your workload with instant feedback and analysis of pupils’ work, readily available to export


▶ Included in your subscription

All DoodleSpell app downloads also include access to the following:

• DoodleEnglish, our accompanying app which supports mastery of punctuation, grammar, spelling and comprehension
• DoodleConnect, our parent app where you can track progress, get instant updates and set motivational goals
•The Parent Dashboard, our online hub for discovering your child’s strengths and weaknesses

Enjoy full access to all of DoodleSpell’s features with DoodleSpell Premium! There are two types of subscriptions available per child:

One-month subscription - $10.99
Annual subscription - $94.99


▶ The boring stuff

Home users will need a paid subscription in order to get access to the Premium version of DoodleSpell.

The one-month subscription will be automatically renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period.

Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24hr period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your iTunes account settings.

When a subscription is cancelled, access to Premium features will expire at the end of the current payment period.
descriptionShort: Rapidly accelerate your child's spelling with personalized daily practice.

Learn how to spell with DoodleSpell, the spelling app that brings words to life like never before!

Filled with thousands of interactive exercises, DoodleSpell creates every child a unique learning experience tailored to their needs, boosting their confidence and ability in spelling.


✓ Learn how to spell even the trickiest of words with fun, curriculum-aligned questions and spelling games for kids
✓ Boost your child’s vocabulary with exercises that explore the meaning behind words and how to use them in sentences
✓ Enjoy a fully personalised spelling programme that continually adapts to your child’s needs, letting them work independently
✓ Get ready for spelling tests and spelling bees by adding your own words into the app in just a few clicks
✓ Designed to be used for 10 minutes a day, DoodleSpell can be used offline on tablets and phones, letting your child learn their spellings anywhere, anytime



▶ For children

• A fun and engaging work programme they’ll want to use every day
• Fun spelling games to play, rewards to earn and badges to unlock – all specifically designed for kids!
• Unlockable potions that can be mixed together to transform their avatar



▶ For parents

• A low-cost alternative to tuition that’ll boost your child’s confidence and help them prepare for spelling tests and spelling bees
• No need to set or mark your child's work — DoodleSpell does the hard work for you!
• Easily track your child’s progress using the free DoodleConnect app or online Parent Dashboard


▶ For teachers

• A time-saving homework, intervention or consolidation tool that’ll support your teaching and reduce your workload
• Say goodbye to setting and marking differentiated work – DoodleSpell does the hard work for you!
• Easily identify learning gaps, track pupils’ progress and download in-depth reports using the online Teacher Dashboard



▶ Pricing

Download the app for free or enjoy access to all of DoodleSpell’s features by purchasing DoodleEnglish Premium!

A DoodleEnglish Premium subscription includes access to DoodleSpell and DoodleEnglish, our interactive grammar and comprehension app.

There are a variety of subscription types available (all beginning with a free 7-day trial):



Single child subscriptions:

DoodleEnglish + DoodleSpell (monthly): £7.99
DoodleEnglish + DoodleSpell (annual): £69.99
DoodleBundle – access to all four Doodle apps (monthly): £12.99
DoodleBundle – access to all four Doodle apps (annual): £119.99



Family subscriptions (up to five children):

DoodleEnglish + DoodleSpell (monthly): £12.99
DoodleEnglish + DoodleSpell (annual): £119.99
DoodleBundle – access to all four Doodle apps (monthly): £16.99
DoodleBundle – access to all four Doodle apps (annual): £159.99



▶ Join our community today!

“I am an enormous fan of yours and am always recommending you to friends. You have totally turned my daughter’s spelling around after years of trying other methods. Thank you!” – Jo, parent

“I like that it covers certain segments of learning but also keeps coming back to units already done when quizzing. The games and mixing potions are very fun. Thank you, Team Doodle!” – Barbara, parent, Trustpilot

“Doodle is a fab platform to get children engaged with maths, English, spelling and times tables. It’s easy to use, and I’d highly recommend it.” – Clare, parent, Trustpilot
descriptionShort: Learn how to spell + get ready for spelling tests with fun word games for kids!

descriptionHtml:
Learn how to spell with DoodleSpell, the spelling app that brings words to life like never before!

Filled with thousands of interactive exercises, DoodleSpell creates every child a unique learning experience tailored to their needs, boosting their confidence and ability in spelling.


✓ Learn how to spell even the trickiest of words with fun, curriculum-aligned questions and spelling games for kids
✓ Boost your child’s vocabulary with exercises that explore the meaning behind words and how to use them in sentences
✓ Enjoy a fully personalised spelling programme that continually adapts to your child’s needs, letting them work independently
✓ Get ready for spelling tests and spelling bees by adding your own words into the app in just a few clicks
✓ Designed to be used for 10 minutes a day, DoodleSpell can be used offline on tablets and phones, letting your child learn their spellings anywhere, anytime



▶ For children

• A fun and engaging work programme they’ll want to use every day
• Fun spelling games to play, rewards to earn and badges to unlock – all specifically designed for kids!
• Unlockable potions that can be mixed together to transform their avatar



▶ For parents

• A low-cost alternative to tuition that’ll boost your child’s confidence and help them prepare for spelling tests and spelling bees
• No need to set or mark your child's work — DoodleSpell does the hard work for you!
• Easily track your child’s progress using the free DoodleConnect app or online Parent Dashboard


▶ For teachers

• A time-saving homework, intervention or consolidation tool that’ll support your teaching and reduce your workload
• Say goodbye to setting and marking differentiated work – DoodleSpell does the hard work for you!
• Easily identify learning gaps, track pupils’ progress and download in-depth reports using the online Teacher Dashboard
